syncText.0: Celo keeps your assets secure and enables you to send and receive value with anyone
syncText.1: Celo Dollars are a stable digital asset that tracks to the value of the US Dollar
syncText.2: Verify your phone number so other Celo users can find you and send you value

inviteText.0: Enter your invitation code. If you do not have one, ask someone in the Celo Community to invite you.
inviteText.1: By joining this application, you agree to share your name & phone number with us. Learn more at

namePrompt: Please enter your first and last name

backupIntro.0: If you lose your phone or delete the Celo app, you will lose all of the gold and dollars in your wallet.
backupIntro.1: You can back up your wallet by writing down a backup phrase on a piece of paper and storing it securely. This will allow you to restore your wallet in the future if you need to.
backupIntro.2: Don't take a screenshot or save on your phone notes. Make sure to write the backup phrase down and keep it safe.

backupSkipText.0: Without a Backup Phrase, you can lose access to your wallet

shareBackupText: Share your Backup Phrase with one other person who you completely trust.

text.0: Write this phrase down on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere safe.
text.1: Donâ€™t show your phrase to anyone else. They can access your wallet if they see it.

whatsappMessage:
Important: please keep this private. 

I'm sending you the Backup Phrase to my Celo Wallet:
setBackupInfo: Once you have finished, we will verify that you wrote down the Backup Phrase correctly.
Question: Question
wrongAnswerText: We will take you back to the screen with your backup phrase so that you ensure you wrote it down correctly.
backupCompleteText: Please do not lose this phrase. It is critical that you maintain this in a safe place, as this is the only way to unlock your wallet should you lose your phone.
faq_terms_footer: <0>Test FAQ is </0><1>here</1><2> Terms of service are </2><3>here</3>

photosNUX.0: Celo uses your address book to show photos
photosNUX.1: You can change a photo by updating your contacts
photosNUX.2: Only you can see these photos locally on your phone
